sources.title: Kids on The Slope (2018)
sources.description: It is summer 10 years ago. Kaoru transfers to a new school and has a fateful encounter with the school's terrifying bad-boy Sentaro. They bond over jazz and Kaoru finds that he's oddly drawn to the rough-mannered Sentaro. After jamming on the piano and drums and spending time with Sentaro's childhood friend Ritsuko, Kaoru falls for Ritsuko but finds out she likes Sentaro.

metadata.Plot: Two different students - a successful but aloof academic and a rebellious but kindhearted delinquent - form a friendship through their love for music.
metadata.Actors: Yuri Chinen, Dean Fujioka, Nana Komatsu
